p.e:
MAKING FRIENDS:
It wasn't exactly as easy as it could have been.
My past experiances have led me to become
very wary of getting too comfortable around
others.
A lot of the people here acted a little bit too
crazy for my comfort but , as I got to meet 
and understand more people, I genuinly enjoyed
my time with them.
I'm still very picky with my friends but people
like Ben and Zid are the sort of people who
,I feel, are good friends.
